name: Abomination: A Ram's Tale
description:
The Story.

Abomination: A Ram's tale is a story-driven role-playing game that follows the tale of a ram who was used as a test subject in a gruesome laboratory. Being the runt of the litter was not easy, but our protagonist grew up happily like his other, taller siblings. This did not last for long. Complications with the operation of the ram ranch convinced the owners that they needed to donate one of their rams to a local genetic experiment. This is where your story begins.

 The story of this game is entirely up to you. Over the course of the game, you will be presented with a series of opportunities to do good, bad or neither. Doing so affects the overall path that your character takes, and thus the outcome of the story.

All of this will take place over three chapters of the game.

The Gameplay.

The game consists of two main parts: The overworld and Combat. Like most RPGs, you will spend a good deal of your time exploring the overworld in search for items and quests, some of which will contribute to 

The combat phases are closely related to the overworld in that the perspective doesn't change and it takes place in real time. To be effective in combat, you must make use of your surroundings while observing your enemy's attack patterns to determine the best course of action.

Depending on the path of your character, you will be granted special abilities and stats that will greatly aid you in combat, but will also change how enemies approach you.

The Arts.

The direction of the art style in this game was heavily inspired by Undertale!

The soundtrack for the game is produced by DJ ESKIMO, who created the soundtrack for Billy Gunslinger! Many of the songs feature soft piano melodies and upbeat banjo strums that inspire the player to keep moving forward!

The official soundtrack for Chapter 1 is now available on Bandcamp, iTunes, Spotify and YouTube!
